thread.title: Best Pools and What to Wear to Them - Summer Swimsuit Shopping
thread.title_full: Best Pools and What to Wear to Them - Summer Swimsuit Shopping

author: Steff Yotka
title: Best Pools and What to Wear to Them - Summer Swimsuit Shopping
text:
The sweltering summer temperatures aren’t letting up anytime soon, and while linen dresses get the job done for day, sometimes the only way to cool down is to take a quick splash in the pool. Don’t settle for your average backyard spot—we’ve rounded up the 10 chicest swim destinations and what to wear for your visit. Whether you hang out in The Joule’s rooftop cantilevered pool in Dallas or travel to Bali to swim among the treetops, you can be certain that these will outdo your standard midday dip.
Shop See all products for The World’s Best Pools—and What to Wear Once You’re There. See all products
